main.heading:
The pioneers of digital transformation
Training sector

whoWeAre.heading: About us
whoWeAre.text: Technical expertise.. Passion for training.. Unique management skills.. Three factors converged to be produced by Sajil IT platform company, an entity that is expanding at a steady pace with the aim of enriching the Saudi training sector with the latest effective digital solutions by providing digital platforms covering all aspects of the trainee's journey, from registration to evaluation, to all steps of the traditional training journey.

vision.heading: Vision
vision.text: To be the first and most effective destination in implementing digital transformation projects in training sector within Saudi Arabia

message.heading: Mission
message.text: Provide the latest innovative and customized digital solutions to our clients by developing training services that aim to increase the digital experience of the organization, coach and trainee

list.heading: Innovation
list.text: In each step of planning, design and implementation

list.heading: Professionalism
list.text: In all our practices with relevant institutions and individuals

list.heading: Integrity
list.text: In all our internal and external business

list.heading: Responsibility
list.text: To stakeholders to preserve their rights and to abide by their promises

support.heading: Entities we support their digital transformation

list.heading: Government and semi-government agencies
list.text: Through a comprehensive digital transformation that contributes to improving the quality of delivery of their services to beneficiaries, such as "SASL"

list.heading: Educational institutions
list.text: By integrating digital solutions with traditional practices, contributing to their revenue growth and delivering a distinctive user experience, such as "Business Noura"

list.heading: Training institutions in quality specialties
list.text: By providing a specialized training platform for professional trainers like "Tadarab Platform "

list.heading: Tadarab Platform
list.text: A training platform that provides digital empowerment mechanisms for professional trainers, which includes providing a complete digital training journey from booking to evaluating training performance and its outputs by trainers and trainees, which has succeeded in attracting some of the largest training institutions in the Kingdom to join the platform

list.heading: SASL
list.text: A government platform that aims to ensure a minimum level of knowledge of legal regulations and principles for legal practitioners in various sectors and raise the level of practicing the legal profession and legal advice in accordance with the best international practices in a manner befitting the status of the Kingdom

list.heading: Business Noura Platform
list.text: An educational platform that aims to provide a different educational experience in entrepreneurship, targeting entrepreneurs and project owners. It also provides various educational services and tools that help in building various skills required in the field of business
